radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of thorax and abdomen
radiographic_examinations.findings: Prostatic hypertrophy and basal pleural-parenchymal hyperdensity in the left lung, interpreted as the result of an infective process.
Excluded the presence of basal ganglia calcification.
Punctiform T2 hyperintense lesions in bihemispheric white matter of probable vascular origin; basal ganglia appeared to be spared; mild bilateral hippocampal atrophy.
Hyperfixation of pulmonary bases and a few thoracic lymph nodes, interpreted as basal pneumonia; diffuse cortical hypermetabolism particularly in the basal ganglia.
